<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS == 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mutexes to synchronize installing error handlers and calling error handlers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not use ManagedStatic, or that may allocate memory while attempting to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// report an OOM.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This usage of std::mutex has to be conditionalized behind ifdefs because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of this script:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   compiler-rt/lib/sanitizer&#95;common/symbolizer/scripts/build&#95;symbolizer.sh</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That script attempts to statically link the LLVM symbolizer library with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STL and hide all of its symbols with &#39;opt -internalize&#39;. To reduce size, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cuts out the threading portions of the hermetic copy of libc++ that it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// builds. We can remove these ifdefs if that script goes away.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::mutex ErrorHandlerMutex;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::mutex BadAllocErrorHandlerMutex;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/include/llvm/support/windows/windowssupport-h">llvm/Support/Windows/WindowsSupport.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is equivalent to NtCurrentTeb()-&gt;LastStatusValue, but the public</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#95;TEB definition does not expose the LastStatusValue field directly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid offsetting into this structure by calling RtlGetLastNtStatus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from ntdll.dll.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The return of this function will roughly match that of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GetLastError, but this lower level API disambiguates some cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that GetLastError does not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For more information, see:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://www.geoffchappell.com/studies/windows/km/ntoskrnl/inc/api/pebteb/teb/index.htm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/issues/89137</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">extern</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;C&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NTSYSAPI NTSTATUS NTAPI RtlGetLastNtStatus();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function obtains the last error code and maps it. It may call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RtlGetLastNtStatus, which is a lower level API that can return a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more specific error code than GetLastError.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::error&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a2600cec8c2ac4914611a6ba5dff9a5cb">llvm::mapLastWindowsError</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EV = ::GetLastError();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The mapping of NTSTATUS to Win32 error loses some information; special</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case the generic ERROR&#95;ACCESS&#95;DENIED code to check the underlying</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NTSTATUS and potentially return a more accurate error code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EV == ERROR&#95;ACCESS&#95;DENIED) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59739a4f15fb2ec57a6b7fcfe938546b">llvm::errc</a> code = RtlGetLastNtStatus() == STATUS&#95;DELETE&#95;PENDING</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59739a4f15fb2ec57a6b7fcfe938546bae3a20ef2d1f25c60be09aa5de8fd09fc">errc::delete&#95;pending</a></span></CodeLine>
